A playable version of #DOOM on an #LEGO brick using a @Raspberry_Pi #RP2040 by @ancientjames. Uses an accelerometer and tilt for movement, and a capacitance touch sensor to shoot. title: Fast Feedback and Fun in iOS Development with Jon Reid

last_post.content:
"The industry has adopted pull requests as *the* way to code, and it's unfortunate.

The Pull Request was invented to accept code from people who are *not* on your team. From people who you don't know. People who may not have the context you have. It's deliberately an anti-team procedure."

Without understanding how race, gender, class, and the law intersect, we are severely limited in our ability to achieve gender equity. Bad actors that understand very well how these concepts intersect, will use that knowledge to win the long game.

Prof. Kimberlé Crenshaw coined the term intersectionality. Read her stuff.

To Colorize or Not: The Lindyhop’s Most Famous Dance Sequence

Hellzapoppin’ is mainly remembered for the 5-minute Lindy Hop in the middle. It features the Harlem Congaroos, played by Whitey's Lindy Hoppers, a dance troupe out of Harlem's Savoy Ballroom. Like most films from the 1940s, scenes were shot in black and white. Most film buffs will maintain that it’s best seen that way.

1/2

B/W Version

Stopping in to highlight this moving virtual tour of #California history annd Indigenous erasure that most who live here know little about.

The Nisenan tribe, whose unceded ancestral lands include much of the Eastern #Sacramento river valley and Sierra foothills, has still not been granted federal recognition that was unfairly stripped from them, as so much else has been. But they’re still here.

@ramin_hal9001 Oh the story is much more interesting. James Gosling wrote Emacs for Unix. Richard Stallman stole his implementation, and just changed the copyright notices on the files, and that became GNU Emacs.

Check out Gosling’s recounting of the story here, including why he let him get away with it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJ6XHroNewc&t=9896s

BTW, if you look into the sources of that github repo, the .ml files are elisp. Those little summaries that GH gives you of what languages are used, aren’t especially accurage.

#Emacs

title: The OTHER AI Alignment Problem: Mesa-Optimizers and Inner Alignment

last_post.content: Mist, das nächste Kaninchenloch für das Wochenende - #AI #Safety #Sicherheit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bJLcIBixGj8 - jetzt bin ich am überlegen welche Auswirkungen das hat. So wie ich es verstanden habe: wenn ich einen komplexen Optimierungs-Algorithmus auf eine Ziel Funktion trainiert habe und danach das Ziel ändere, legt die "AI" eine weitere Schicht drauf um das neue Ziel zu erreichen aber die alten Strukturen bleiben erhalten - zugehöriges Paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/1906.01820.pdf

I'm not a #HarryPotter fan, and given the obvious problems with the creator, I wouldn't touch #HogwartsLegacy with a 40 foot pole anyway.

But holy crap the discourse, even here on the fediverse, from supposed "allies" who jump through mental hoops to justify contributing further to the #Hogwarts franchise.

I don't have the stamina to explain, to the level of detail I really want to, just how problematic contributing to that franchise is, how it demonstrates disregard for #trans people, and why it invalidates any status as an "ally." I've already spent three decades as a #queer activist fighting #homophobia and #transphobia … and the continued indifference of fair-weather "allies" is exhausting.

But a fantastic person went to that level of detail, in a video you should watch to understand why. Set aside the time, or watch it in segments, if you truly believe you are an ally:

https://youtu.be/_GBUArD51KY

@jerpirate @PixelAndPolyCurator This channel is the one I most recommend - he’s also got free resources on his website:

https://www.youtube.com/@SouthernGFX

last_post.content: Before you buy a ticket for this year's PyCon in Utah, please (re-)watch this talk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4R6FXtZl154 and then ask yourself if you really want to spend your money in a state that looks at someone this brave, this strong, and this beautiful, and says, "Yeah, we think you should be illegal."

#TOcouncil thread: BUDGET DAY! 🧵

Today City Council does The Budget. The cost of COVID has left the City with huge holes in the budget that will be a challenge to fill. But the austerity budget is overshadowed by the revelation of the mayor's inappropriate relationship with a staffer and his promised (and, by some councillors, protested) resignation. This…complicates…the new "strong mayor" powers bequeathed by the Province that give the rest of Council limited ability to change the budget. Today will be a spicy one.

Inori Roy for The Local: https://thelocal.to/toronto-budget-2023/
Dave Rider, Ben Spurr, Alyshah Hasham for the Star: https://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2023/02/10/a-serious-error-of-judgement-mayor-john-tory-had-relationship-with-staffer.html

Livestream link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eT2AfoqMw7A
